showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Cloud}
“Damn, Shinra dogs!!”{PAUSE}“We'll take that submarine!!

please talk to my dog.”

dialogStrings:
“Only authorized personnel are allowed past
this point!”{PAUSE}“You know too, right?
About Junon Navy's important
classified information.”{PAUSE}“A new submarine has almost been completed
using Shinra's top technology.”

“A new version of submarine.
I'll be sailing on it.
Man, I can't wait!”

“Man…
Keeping watch is so boring
at the Underwater Reactor.”

{Cloud}
“Damn, Shinra dogs!!”{PAUSE}“We'll take that submarine!!

“This is the {CYAN}Junon Submarine Dock{WHITE}!”{PAUSE}“If you want to enter,
please talk to my dog.”

Let's go!!”
